page.description: Returns true if the text starts with the specified word.
page.discussion: *FIRST() returns .T. (TRUE) if Find_Stringis found at the start of Search_In_String. Note: Do not confuse this function, which operates on a character expression, with the summary function FIRST() , which operates on a group of records.
page.example: *first(LASTNAME, "MC") -> TRUE, if the LASTNAME field starts with the character string "MC"
